headline: How Recent Assumptions Are Reshaping The Story Behind Indian Energy Exchange (NSEI:IEX)
summary: The fair value estimate for Indian Energy Exchange has been nudged down from ₹149.50 to about ₹144.64 per share, even as the discount rate in the model has been trimmed from 14.54% to about 13.78% and the expected revenue decline adjusted from 3.76% to 4.72%. This kind of reset typically reflects analysts trying to square a more cautious view on the revenue line with a still supportive backdrop for the business, rather than a complete rethink of the stock. Stay with this article to see how...
